ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They are debarred from hearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They have been precluded from hearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed they are debarred from even hearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The satans are barred from listening to anything from the heavens.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed they have been banished from the place of hearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, they have been removed far from hearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Most surely they are far removed from the hearing of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Truly, they are expelled from hearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! verily they are banished from the hearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: indeed they are debarred from overhearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily far from hearing are they removed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, they are kept at bay [even] from hearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Indeed they have been removed far from even (a chance of) hearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, they have been removed far from hearing it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Truly, they are expelled from hearing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed they, from [its] hearing, are removed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:212] Truly they are barred, restrained with blazing stars, from the hearing, of the sayings of the angels.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! verily they) i.e. the devils (are banished from the hearing) they are prevented from hearing the revelation.
